OrgName.entry: NOMAD FIRTH PARK TENANCY SUPPORT SCHEME

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides housing-related support for tenants and owner-occupiers living in the north of Sheffield. Offers a range of practical support and advice to families and individuals who may need help in maintaining their tenancies or those at risk of losing their home. Support provided includes; moving into a property, claiming benefits, budgeting and accessing other relevant agencies and organisations. The service is available for up to 2 years, by which time the service user will have developed the necessary skills and confidence to maintain their home independently. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 3846994.
